title: Time for dhuhr prayer - Assim al hakeem
transcript: the time of lure is from the Saval which is five seven minutes after the Sun leaves the Meridian and goes to the east leaving a short shade directing to the west let me rephrase that the time of Lahore is when the Sun rises and then goes to the zenith of them the Meridian I think they call it five seven minutes when it goes to the west to the east there is a short shadow that increases as the Sun goes to the west once the erect object has a shade to the east equal to its size to its length this means that the time of the is over and now the time of Assad
